text: Fiji was at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, Korea. The Fiji Association of Sports and National Olympic Committee was formed in 1949 and recognized by the IOC in 1955. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Fiji is FIJ. "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-10-12. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Fiji profile at London2012.com *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Sport in Fiji Category:National sports teams of Fiji
title: Fiji at the Olympics
